name: Porterminus
description:
Porterminus is a spooky RPG made by supajackle.

It was originally released in March of 2013.

It follows the story of a girl named Julie, her boyfriend Donnie, and a mysterious cat.

Warning: Although the graphics are all pixel art, it has sort of intense body horror and gore, please keep that in mind before deciding to play.

It was made using RPG Maker VX Ace, so to play you need the Run Time Package, or RTP.

You can find the Mac Port and a version with the RTP on Game Jolt
